item.title: Workflow Phase Progression page
item.description: Phase Progression Manage your project from start to finish using six configurable project phases. Start Up Phase Maximise the return on your investments by ensuring you undertake the correct projects for your organisation. Get Started Â» Initiation Phase Ensure your project has a viable Business Case before committing resources to the project. Ensure your project can be delivered on time. Prime your project to succeed by implementing tried and tested management processes.
